name: Word Search Nerd Adventure
description:
Sitting there while your DM rolls critical hits? Play Word Search Nerd Adventure game! None of that boring normal word search, embrace your inner nerd! It's FREE! PHAT LEWTZ!

Great for kids too! They will learn great names of history and how to spell those difficult science names!

A new random collection of words for each section every time played!

Daring quests to complete and challenge your brain! Complete all quests for that level and level up to the next level of quests! DING!!!

Listen to your own music while playing!

FUN AND ADDICTIVE!! QUICK TO PLAY!

** Have a suggestion or type of word search you'd like to see?? Let us know on Facebook!! *** Come Like our Facebook page!
goo.gl/XzF1ON
